overview: Great Britain is famous for afternoon tea and loose women. Meet Eva May, Holly Kiss, Sarah Kelly XXX, Sookie Blues and Valery Summer, five cougars that know what they want and they know how to get it; it just so happens that in this movie they want young and lively cock! In every scene the “ladies” confess their most torrid secrets and desires, and what they get next is a royal shag that will leave your jaws dropping!
title: British Cougars
